plot: Vincent Rielin tells a story about his genuine effort to aid authorities in the investigation of a crime. He shares this tale in order to prove that no one can be trusted.
title: Waking the Foal
plot_es: Vincent Rielin tells a story about his genuine effort to aid authorities in the investigation of a crime. He shares this tale in order to prove that no one can be trusted.
